All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AbstractCLI
Abstract base class for all user interface boundary classes.
Application
Represents a student's application for an internship opportunity.
ApplicationControl
Controls all application-related operations in the system.
AuthenticationControl
Controls user authentication and session management in the system.
CareerStaff
Represents a career center staff member in the Internship Placement Management System.
CareerStaffCLI
Boundary class for career center staff user interface.
CompanyRepresentative
Represents a company representative user in the Internship Placement Management System.
CompanyRepresentativeCLI
Boundary class for company representative user interface.
ControlInitializer
Central initialization and management class for all controllers.
ControlUtils
Utility class providing common helper methods for control layer operations.
Filter
Helper class to encapsulate filter criteria for internship opportunity search.
InternshipControl
Controls all internship opportunity operations in the system.
InternshipOpportunity
Represents an internship opportunity in the system.
LoginCLI
Boundary class for handling login and registration user interface.
LoginControl
Controls login, registration, and password management functionality.
Main
Main entry point for the Internship Application Management System.
Report
Represents a comprehensive report of internship opportunities.
ReportControl
Controls report generation and management for career center staff.
Student
Represents a student user in the Internship Placement Management System.
StudentCLI
Boundary class for student user interface.
UIHelper
Helper class providing common UI utility methods for Swing dialogs and user interactions.
User
Abstract base class representing a user in the Internship Placement Management System.
UserControl
Controls user management operations performed by Career Center Staff.
UserLoginDirectoryControl
Manages user authentication and user account operations for the system.
